description:
Something from Honoka`s past comes back to haunt her, and Nico makes another attempt at becoming her friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anta-tachi to Iru to Hontto ni Rokuna Koto ga Nai
En traînant avec vous, il n`arrive vraiment rien de bien
Nothing Good Comes From Being Around All of You
あんた達といるとほんっとにろくなことがない
